snippet: Stéphane Denève led the Boston Symphony Orchestra in works by Ravel, Stravinsky and others at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by the Boston Symphony Orchestra, conducted by Stephane Deneve, at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: Stéphane Denève led the Boston Symphony Orchestra in works by Ravel, Stravinsky and others at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: The Boston Symphony Orchestra at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: A Little-Known Guest Arrives to Make an Impression
